title: Computer Crashing
body: There seems to be no rhyme or reason to it, but my computer keeps crashing in the middle of the game when I play. It freezes my entire computer and I have to do a hard restart to get it to work again. I don't think its a problem with my hardware because my laptop is fairly new and I don't encounter this problem with any other game or program. Anyone have any help?

replies.body:
Entire PC freezes are typically caused by driver or hardware problems. There are a number of steps that can be taken to resolve this, but we've consolidated the most common fixes inside our [Bugsplat & Crash guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)

Let me know if those steps caused any change with your freezing.
